story.description:
Implement HAIAMM Strategy & Metrics (SM) practice at Level 1 maturity.

## Practice Overview

**Function:** Governance
**Purpose:** Define AI security strategy and measure effectiveness

## Level 1 Objectives

Establish basic AI security strategy awareness and initial metrics.

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] AI system inventory documented
  - All AI/ML systems listed
  - Data access levels identified
  - Tool/API access documented
  - Owners assigned

- [ ] Top AI security risks identified
  - 3-5 priority risks documented
  - Mapped to OWASP Top 10 LLM/Agentic
  - Business impact assessed

- [ ] Basic metrics tracking established
  - At least 1 security metric defined
  - Monthly collection cadence
  - Baseline established

- [ ] Stakeholders identified
  - Security team contact
  - AI/ML engineering contact
  - Executive sponsor (if applicable)

## Definition of Done

- [ ] All acceptance criteria met
- [ ] Documentation in central repository
- [ ] Stakeholders briefed
- [ ] Evidence collected for assessment

## Resources

- [SM Practice Guide](https://github.com/R3v3rzk1mur4/HAIAMM/docs/practices/SM-Software-OnePager.md)
- [Level 1 Checklist](https://github.com/R3v3rzk1mur4/HAIAMM/docs/templates/checklists/level1-foundation-checklist.md)

## Verifhai Integration

Use `/verifhai-practice SM` for guided implementation assistance.
